principles.heading: Our Customers
principles.text: Customers are our most important asset, Celebration Hardware serves painters, general contractors, handymen, plumbers, landscapers, facility managers, theme parks, hotels & resorts, businesses and other professionals in addition to homeowners in Celebration and Central Florida.

principles.heading: Our Company
principles.text: Founded in 2012, we have been serving customers in Central Florida with hardware, Benjamin Moore paint, electrical and plumbing supplies, fasteners and lawn and garden materials for over 8 years.

principles.heading: Our Products
principles.text: With over 15,000 products stocked in Celebration, Florida, Celebration Hardware is your one stop source for a wide variety of high quality brand name products. Our vendor partners include Benjamin Moore, Emery Jensen, Orgill and Home Depot, providing access to millions of products by special order.
